name: WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveAttrib
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getActiveAttrib() method of the WebGL API returns a WebGLActiveInfo object containing size, type, and name of a vertex attribute. It is generally used when querying unknown attributes either for debugging or generic library creation.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'getActiveAttrib' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glGetActiveAttrib' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
